keyTakeAways: Colombia has recalled its ambassador to the United States, Daniel García-Peña, for consultations, marking a significant diplomatic move in response to U.S. actions and rhetoric.

The recall follows a previous diplomatic incident in July when the U.S. summoned its ambassador to Bogotá after allegations by President Gustavo Petro that the U.S. supported a plot to remove him from power.
U.S. President Donald Trump accused Petro of being an 'illegal drug leader' and threatened to halt large-scale payments and subsidies to Colombia, citing failure in drug interdiction.
The U.S. plans to raise tariffs on Colombian goods, further escalating economic tensions between the two nations.

The U.S. has deployed warships in the Caribbean and launched missile attacks on seven alleged drug-smuggling vessels, resulting in at least 30 deaths, with Petro claiming some victims were Colombian citizens.
Colombia accused the U.S. of 'murder' and stated that some individuals on the vessels were Colombian nationals, adding to the diplomatic crisis.
A Colombian citizen aboard the most recent vessel attacked was returned alive to Colombia, underscoring the human cost of the conflict.

summaryOfNewsArticle: Colombia has recalled its ambassador to the United States, Daniel García-Peña, for consultations, in response to escalating tensions over drug trafficking and U.S. military actions. The move follows a prior diplomatic incident in July, and comes amid accusations from U.S. President Donald Trump that President Gustavo Petro is an 'illegal drug leader' and that Colombia has failed to combat drug cartels. Trump has also threatened to halt subsidies and raise tariffs on Colombian goods. The U.S. has launched missile attacks on seven alleged drug-smuggling vessels in the Caribbean, resulting in at least 30 deaths, with Petro accusing the U.S. of 'murdering' Colombian nationals. A Colombian citizen aboard the latest vessel was returned alive, underscoring the human toll. This diplomatic crisis reflects deepening mistrust and a volatile standoff between Colombia and the United States over security, sovereignty, and economic policy.
title: Colombian ambassador to US recalled to Bogotá for consultations, embassy says
